name: Pixel Perfection
description:
This is a simple pixelated game based on keeping the electricity flowing to prevent the lights being turned off! All you have to do is click to move the cable to "catch" the surges to win!

Key Features:

- Randomly generated "surges"

- Score Display

- Funky music

Credits:

- Catriona Barclay

(Music is royalty free and in public use)

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai
"Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
